definition[0]: the thick soft hair that covers the bodies of some animals, such as cats, dogs, and rabbits
definition[1]: the skin of a dead animal with the fur still attached
example[2]: a ban on fur farming  (=keeping and killing animals for their fur)
definition[2]: a coat or piece of clothing made of fur
example[3]: Lady Yolanda was swathed in elegant furs.
definition[3]: a material that looks and feels like fur
example[4]: a pair of gloves trimmed with fake fur
definition[4]: a harmful or unpleasant substance that sometimes forms on surfaces that are always wet, such as water pipes
definition[5]: to become covered with an unwanted substance
